name: Killjoy Hunter Yuuko
description:
Following the events of "ef - the latter tale," Yuuko returns to Otowa in her old friends' dreams to take out the monsters known as "KILLJOYs" which force nightmares upon happy couples.

Description & Features

- A platforming adventure with five exciting levels.

- Boss fights featuring the cast of "ef - the first tale" and "ef - the latter tale."
- Experience a new mini-after story from the iconic series!
